description: Try our easy to follow Always Fresh Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pizza,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Always Fresh Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: .5 cup Always Fresh Black Olives, sliced
.5 cup Always Fresh Sundried Tomatoes, strips
150g fresh mozzarella cheese, cut into 1cm slices

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat Oven: Place x 2 trays (or pizza stones) in the middle of your oven, and preheat to 230Â°C.

As the oven is preheating, assemble the pizzas. Using a large spoon, add roughly 1 cup of the tomato sauce on one pizza base, leaving a 2/3 cm border on all sides. Use the back of the spoon to spread it evenly and thinly.
Sprinkle half of the Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese onto the pizza sauce and half of the cubed mozzarella, distributing it evenly over the entire pizza.
Add 1/2 cup each of the sundried tomatoes and sliced olives.
Repeat with the second pizza base.
Slide the pizza bases onto the oven trays or stones and bake for 7 to 8 minutes, or until golden and the cheese is bubbling and caramelized.
Remove the pizzas from the oven, transfer to a wooden cutting board and serve with fresh basil. Enjoy.
